mapper.select: SELECT ISBN, TITLE, COVER, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBDATE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PUBDATE DESC) AS RN, ISBN, TITLE, COVER, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBDATE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_ID FROM BOOK) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
